name: Simple Easy YouTube Embed Video
author: ifourtechnolab

sections.description:
Simple Easy YouTube Embed Video load YouTube Videos in to Your Post.

You can load YouTube videos by Multiple ways like Video Id, Playlist and User Uploaded Video Or Channel.

For Support Contact Us

YouTube Player API Reference YouTube Player API Documentation

YouTube Player Demo YouTube Player Demo

Stackoverflow tag Stackoverflow
sections.installation:
1. Upload simple-easy-youtube-embed-video.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Generate Shortcode and add into Your post to load Videos.
sections.faq:
1. It is free ?
    Yes.- Simple Easy YouTube Embed Video is totaly free and there is no extra charges for used this plugin
  2. It is Configurable ?
    Yes.- Simple Easy YouTube Embed Video is configurable from admin.

Installation Instructions

  1. Upload simple-easy-youtube-embed-video.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Generate Shortcode and add into Your post to load Videos.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Simple Easy YouTube Embed Video is ready for production.
